steps.name: the status code is 201
the employee is successfully deleted with the "message" in response "Entry deleted"
the "employee[0].employee_id" is same as the one stored in global
a JWT is generated
a request is prepared to get all employees
a GET call is made to retrieve all employees
the status code of the request is 200
it contains key1 "Total Employees" and Key2 "Employees"
a JWT is generated
a request is prepared to get all employees status
a Get call is made to retrieve the status of all employees
it contains the value1 "Employee" value2 "Worker"
